Unnamed Package

  • Class
    Description
    AudioDecorator
    class to add audio to the message
    FileDecorator
    class to add file to the message
    ImageDecorator
    class to add image to the message
    Main
    Main class creates text message and then adds image file and audio to it.
    Message
    interface that is used for messages
    it has one method to send the message
    MessageDecorator
    Abstract class needed for other message decorators
    It aggregates Message interface to use send() method in different decorators
    Using send() method to add some content to the current message
    TextMessage
    Standart class for message with text
